sentences.english: They fiddled him into doing the work.

sentences.chinese: 她给人连哄带骗签了字。

sentences.english: The problem is no one knows how to coax kids into sleeping more.
sentences.chinese: 问题在于没有人知道怎样才能哄孩子多睡会儿。

sentences.english: City wall top and bottom discusses in succession, coax noisy voice in, that white fog is pile up near.
sentences.chinese: 城墙上下议论纷纷，哄吵声中，那片白雾越来越近。

sentences.english: Lead the relationship between back and double grace, specially effort to coax back double grace.
sentences.chinese: 辛勇为了挽回与双怡的关系，特地花心思哄回双怡。

sentences.english: She coaxed a smile from the baby.
He jollied her along until she agreed to go with him.
sentences.chinese: 他把她哄得高高兴兴地同意跟他一道去了。

sentences.english: They jollied the little girl into going with them.
sentences.chinese: 他们哄得那女孩跟他们一起去。

sentences.english: He toadies to his aunt, hoping to gain some of her money.
sentences.chinese: 他花言巧语地哄着他姑姑，想从她那儿弄些钱。

sentences.english: City wall altitude and base discusses in succession, coax loud voice in, that white fog is scale up close.
sentences.chinese: 城墙上下议论纷纷，哄吵声中，那片白雾越来越近。

sentences.english: The mother pacified her crying baby.
The children wheedled me into letting them go to the film.
sentences.chinese: 孩子们把我哄得同意让他们去看电影了。

sentences.english: I wangled an invitation out of George.
sentences.chinese: 我哄乔治给我发了请帖。

sentences.english: Mother ran after me, murmuring fine words to coax me.
sentences.chinese: 母亲在后面小跑着，嘴里还在不断地说着好话哄我。

sentences.english: I coaxed my sister into taking me to the theater.
sentences.chinese: 我用好话哄姐姐带我去看戏。

sentences.english: She's hypnotizing to a little girl.
sentences.chinese: 她正在哄一个小女孩睡觉。
